message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Alice, $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product but I'm only willing to pay $120. Let me know if that works for you.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand it's a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $160. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $160 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $130.  If we can't agree on something closer to that, I may have to look at other options.

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, and I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $145. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal. Let me know if it works for you.
Alice, while I appreciate you coming down further, $145 is still outside my budget.  I'm ready to pay $135. If you're willing to meet me there, we can close the deal.

Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go down to $135. I can offer it to you for $140. It's the best I can do, and I think it's still a great deal. Let me know if it works for you.
